long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay focused with Hide Distractions!

Hide Distractions is a powerful browser extension that blocks non-essential sections and sources of distraction on popular websites and social networks. With it, you can focus solely on the main content, increasing your productivity and efficiency.

See what is removed on each platform:

- Netflix: Everything! You will be redirected to Google when accessing the site.

- Instagram: Feed, Stories, Explore, and Reels - only essential content remains visible.

- Facebook: Feed, Stories, and Videos - stay free from endless distractions.

- TikTok: Everything! You will be redirected to Google when trying to access it.

- YouTube: Home, Related Videos, and Shorts - total focus on the videos you actually want to watch.

*It is worth remembering that only the sections of social networks that you allow will be removed by activating their hiding in the extension panel.

Developed with modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Mutation Observer, and Chrome Storage, Hide Distractions offers an optimized and customizable experience.

Install it now and experience a new way of browsing, free from unnecessary distractions! Your productivity will thank you.
